name: No DQ
description: No Disqualification: All weapons are legal. Interference from outside parties is allowed. The match can only end by pinfall or submission inside the ring.

name: Extreme
description: Extreme Rules: Similar to No DQ, but with an emphasis on hardcore wrestling and the use of unconventional weapons. Falls count anywhere in the arena.

name: Normal
description: Standard Match: Victory is achieved by pinfall, submission, count-out, or disqualification. Standard rules apply, including rope breaks and a 10-count for being outside the ring.

name: Elimination
description: Elimination Match: Participants are eliminated individually by pinfall or submission until only one wrestler or team remains.

name: Over the Top Rope Elimination
description: Battle Royal: Participants are eliminated when they are thrown over the top rope and both feet touch the floor. The last person in the ring wins.

name: Submission
description: Submission Match: The only way to win is by forcing an opponent to submit. There are no pinfalls, count-outs, or disqualifications.

name: Promo
description: A non-wrestling segment where participants speak to the audience, each other, or an interviewer to advance a storyline. No physical combat occurs.

name: Cage
description: Steel Cage Match: The ring is surrounded by a steel cage. Victory can be achieved by escaping the cage (either over the top or through the door) or by pinfall/submission inside the ring.

name: Last Man Standing
description: Last Man Standing: The match is won when one wrestler is unable to answer a 10-count from the referee. There are no pinfalls, submissions, or disqualifications.

name: Free-For-All
description: Every wrestler for themselves. The first person to achieve a pinfall or submission wins. No teams or alliances are officially recognized.

name: I Quit Match
description: I Quit Match: The only way to win is to force your opponent to say the words 'I Quit' into a microphone. There are no other ways to win.

name: Ladder Match
description: Ladder Match: A championship or other prize is suspended above the ring. The winner is the first person to climb a ladder and retrieve the prize.

name: Casket Match
description: Casket Match: The only way to win is to force your opponent into a casket and close the lid.

name: Tables, Ladders and Chairs (TLC)
description: TLC Match: A variation of a Ladder Match where tables and chairs are also legal and expected to be used. Victory is achieved by retrieving the suspended prize.

name: ðŸª– War Games
description: War Games: Two teams are locked inside a massive cage covering two rings. Participants enter at timed intervals. Once all participants are in, 'The Match Beyond' begins, and victory can only be achieved by pinfall or submission.

name: Barbwire Exploding Deathmatch
description: An extreme and violent match where the ring ropes are replaced with barbed wire, and various objects in and around the ring are rigged to explode on impact.

name: Gauntlet
description: A series of one-on-one matches. The winner of each match stays in the ring to face the next opponent in line until all opponents have been defeated.
